meta.title: Bhargav Rathod - Portfolio
meta.description: Senior Software Engineer specializing in full-stack development and system design.

about.description: I'm a Senior Software Engineer who lives and breathes Data Structures, Algorithms, and Machine Learning—because let's be real, tech stacks evolve, but solid logic never goes out of style. My work spans Machine Learning research, Python, .NET, and Angular, where I design and ship end-to-end, production-ready systems. From building efficient APIs and optimizing performance-critical code to crafting clean, intuitive user interfaces, I focus on creating software that is scalable, maintainable, and built to last. System design? Been there, built that—and iterated on it. I enjoy breaking down large, ambiguous problems into well-structured components and making thoughtful trade-offs across scalability, reliability, and simplicity. Recently, my [machine learning research paper](https://www.ijfmr.com/research-paper.php?id=64396) was published in the International Journal for Multidisciplinary Research (IJFMR).

items.title: A Comprehensive Comparative Analysis of Machine Learning Algorithms for Predictive Diagnosis of Cardiovascular Disease
items.description: International Journal for Multidisciplinary Research (IJFMR), Volume 7, Issue 6 (November - December 2025)

items.title: Full-Stack Software Developer
description: Designing and developing end-to-end scalable features with microservices architecture using .NET, integrating with SQL databases and deployed through DevOps CI/CD pipelines for critical healthcare applications.
Developing modular and responsive UI/UX components using Angular 18+ and TypeScript, incorporating advanced state management and performance optimization.
Conducted performance optimization, code reviews, and security audits. Developed end-to-end test suites, improving release quality and reducing regression incidents by ~60%.

items.title: Member of Technical Staff
description: Engineered core product modules using .NET Core, Entity Framework, and Node.js for both SaaS and on-prem deployments, enabling modular scaling across multiple tenants.
Refactored legacy .NET Framework modules into unified .NET Core services, improving response time by ~50% and enabling containerization.
Developed full-stack features using Angular, implemented role-based access control, and integrated telemetry to track user behavior.
Authored integration and unit test frameworks, improving code coverage to 89%+ and ensuring system stability during major releases.

items.title: Senior Systems Engineer
description: Designed 10+ complex enterprise workflows for telecoms and healthcare clients using Robotic Process Automation (RPA) AssistEdge platform.
Integrated RPA with back-end systems and APIs, reducing manual effort by ~92% and enhancing operational accuracy across client business processes.

items.title: Intern
description: Worked on Python3 programming training, RPA skills development, and created a set of activities to implement AssistEdge Automation RPA Studio Product.

items.title: Transformers
items.description: Transformers understand language by letting every word look at every other word, using attention, while remembering word order — creating rich, context-aware meanings.

items.title: K-NN (K-Nearest Neighbors)
items.description: Classic K-Nearest Neighbors with Curse of Dimensionality

items.title: Ball-Trees
items.description: Data Structure for High-Dimensional Nearest Neighbor Search

items.title: KD-Trees
items.description: A k-d tree (short for k-dimensional tree) is a space-partitioning data structure for organizing points in a k-dimensional space.

items.title: Adversarial Attacks and Generative Models in Deep Learning
items.description: Deep learning models are now everywhere—helping us recognize images, chat online, and even drive cars. But did you know these AI systems can be tricked by clever attackers, and also generate stunning new content? Let's dive into these two key ideas: Adversarial Robustness and Generative Models.

items.title: DIKW with Machine Learning
items.description: The journey from **Data → Information → Knowledge → Wisdom** defines not just the evolution of intelligent systems, but also how we, as humans, interpret and interact with the world around us!

items.title: Types of Machine Learning (Part II)
items.description: Deep dive into the basic types of ML.

items.title: Types of Machine Learning (Part I)
items.description: Types of Machine Learning.

items.title: Roadmap.IO - AI-Powered Roadmap Generation
items.description: Developed a full-stack web application for AI-powered interview roadmap generation using Next.js and PostgreSQL. Integrated advanced LLM models including LLaMA 3.3, Qwen-QWQ, and Whisper Large v3 for contextual generation. Implemented user authentication, credit-based payments, and a dynamic UI with role-specific roadmap generation features.
items.type: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, LLM Integration, Data Analytics, Full-Stack Implementation

items.title: Invoice Generation System
items.description: Designed and built an offline utility tool for invoice generation and inventory management. Key features include streamlined invoice creation, printing functionality, record keeping, and a basic analytics dashboard.

items.title: JsonFolio - Cool Portfolio in Minutes
items.description: A lightweight, customizable portfolio template that lets you create a stunning personal website by simply editing a JSON file. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, it's fast, responsive, and easy to deploy. No multiple redeployments needed.
items.type: Frontend Implementation, JSON-Based Configuration, Dynamic Data Loading, No Frequent Redeployments

items.title: Training & Placement System
items.description: Engineered a comprehensive T&P portal for colleges and universities. Enables Training & Placement Officers to manage company visits and recruitment announcements. Students can view opportunities, apply, and access results. Includes faculty notices, alumni insights, and secure login-based access for stakeholders.
items.type: MVC, Full-Stack Implementation, Database Management, Role-Based Features

achievements.title: Certifications & Achievements
description: Led major product releases, including AssistEdge RPA by EdgeVerve and Erequisition by Q2 Labs Solutions for IQVIA, serving over 1M+ active users and key industry stakeholders. Played a pivotal role as Development Lead, ensuring successful product delivery within defined timelines.
Recognized as Top Performer at EdgeVerve Systems for exceptional contributions to product development and innovation.
Active participation in #T20DSAChallenge competition organized by AlgoUniversity on Data Structures & Algorithms.

certifications.name: Google Cloud Certified - Associate Cloud Engineer

items.author: Dr. Brijesh Bhatt
items.designation: NLP Researcher & Professor at Dharmsinh Desai University
items.message:
I have taught Bhargav Design and analysis of algorithm and Software Engineering during his Bachelor of technology.

I have also mentored him in laboratory work and I also mentored him during his Project on 'Training and Placement Systems'. He is true team leader, he has very high coding skills and he gives his high level of dedication and commitment towards work. He has ablities on learning new things and had an excellent grasping power.

I can say that he will contribute wherever he goes since he possesses genuine interest in the subject, works tirelessly in knowing the subject well, is a quick learner and also good at time management.

items.author: Ashish Gor
items.designation: Assistant Professor at Dharmsinh Desai University
items.message:
I had the opportunity to teach Bhargav in several core subjects, including Algorithms, Mathematics for Machine Learning, Cryptography & Network Security, and Compiler Construction. He has a clear understanding of fundamentals and approaches problems with logical and structured thinking.

Bhargav is sincere and curious, and he is always willing to go beyond what is taught in the classroom. He has a good ability to connect theoretical concepts with practical understanding, which prepares him well for real-world challenges. I am confident he will do very well in his career and be a valuable contributor wherever he works.

items.author: Hariom Pandya
items.message: I remember Bhargav as one of my enthusiastic and hard-working students. He has learned C programming, Linux OS concepts, DSA, and core computer engineering principles under me during his B.Tech program. His problem-solving capacity and eagerness towards learning the concepts in depth make him the best fit for the industry. I wish Bhargav all the very best in his future endeavors!

items.author: John Boyle
items.message: I had the pleasure of working with Bhargav Rathod during our time supporting the Lumen and CenturyLink RPA portfolio. Bhargav consistently demonstrated strong technical acumen and leadership, designing and delivering robust RPA solutions that continue to run smoothly in production. His dedication and collaborative spirit made him an invaluable partner, and I highly recommend him for any future endeavors in automation and enterprise transformation.

items.author: Neeraj B
items.message: Bhargav is a real gem to work with. He is very hard working and posses good technical understanding. He has good problem solving skills and is a quick learner. He has worked extensively on c# . Net and RPA.

items.author: Amit Karir
items.message: Bhargav was part of my team supporting a major US telecom customer for their business process optimization program by leveraging RPA and custom-code automation. He has performed the role of automation developer and supported various process functions while part of this automation account. He is a hard working developer and I would highly recommend him for any technical and engineering profile or work.

items.author: G V Roshan Kumar
items.message: I had the pleasure of collaborating with Bhargav at Edgeverve on the CoE Cockpit project. As a product manager, I was consistently impressed by his technical acumen, problem-solving skills, and unwavering dedication. Bhargav's ability to bridge the gap between engineering and product, coupled with his collaborative spirit, made him a valuable asset to our team. I wholeheartedly recommend Bhargav for any role that requires a talented and versatile individual.

items.author: Swasti Ray
items.message: Bhargav was an intern in Infosys Limited. He worked enthusiastically on application development using .Net Technologies - C#, SQL Server, EF Core and various front end tools.

items.author: Shraddha Kulkarni
items.message: I had pleasure of working with Bhargav on several RPA and .Net projects. Bhargav consistently demonstrated exceptional technical skills and deep understanding of RPA tools and methologies. Beyond technical expertise, he is a proactive and collaborative team member. His positive attitude and dedication to continuous learning is commendable.

quote.text: Brute force isn't stupidity — it's the spark that starts the real solution.
